subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Carlos Tevez and Michael Carrick led Manchester United to within a point of its third straight English Premier League title with a 2-1 victory at Wigan. United trailed after a goal by Hugo Rodallega in the 28th minute. Tevez went on as a substitute in the 58th minute and tied it three minutes later. Carrick scored the winner with four minutes remaining. United needs only to avoid defeat at home against Arsenal on Saturday to clinch the championship with a game remaining. It would then tie Liverpool with a record 18 titles.
